DOC.brief_summary: This cohort study evaluate prevalence infra clinical liver injury among group adult patient present Alpha-1 AT deficiency follow large university hospital Lyon , France .
DOC.brief_title: Liver Disease Adults With Alpha-1 AT Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old Presenting Alpha1 AT deficiency ( Alpha1 AT level < 0.8g/l time diagnosis ) Patients present liver disease relate Alpha1 AT deficiency
